entry.tran: 屈从的;顺从的;勉强接受的;逆来顺受的
entry.def: If you are resigned to an unpleasant situation or fact, you accept it without complaining because you realize that you cannot change it.

example.ex: He is resigned to the noise and mess...
example.tran: 他勉强接受了这里的喧嚣和脏乱。

example.ex: Pauline was already resigned to losing her home.
example.tran: 保利娜已经无奈地接受了失去家园的事实。
